meanings.sent1: She walked gawkishly across the stage, tripping over her own feet.
meanings.sent2: The child stared gawkishly at the strange animal in the zoo.
meanings.sent3: He gawkishly tried to imitate the dance moves, causing everyone to laugh.
meanings.sent4: The robot moved gawkishly, as if it was learning to walk for the first time.
meanings.sent5: The old man moved gawkishly, his joints creaking with each step.

meanings.sent1: The scarecrow stood gawkishly in the middle of the field, its arms outstretched.
meanings.sent2: The awkward teenager blushed gawkishly when complimented on their outfit.
meanings.sent3: The penguin waddled gawkishly across the ice, slipping every few steps.
meanings.sent4: The alien creature moved gawkishly, its limbs bending in unnatural ways.
meanings.sent5: The clown danced gawkishly, making exaggerated movements to entertain the children.
